raw: * Common base class for all DOM events.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Common base class for all DOM events.

raw: * @type {Integer} The modifier mask for the shift key.

@type.name: @type
@type.body: {Integer} The modifier mask for the shift key.

raw: overridden
* Return in a bit map, which modifier keys are pressed. The constants
* {@link #SHIFT_MASK}, {@link #CTRL_MASK}, {@link #ALT_MASK},
* {@link #META_MASK} and {@link #CAPSLOCK_MASK} define the bit positions
* of the corresponding keys.
* @return {Integer} A bit map with the pressed modifier keys.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Return in a bit map, which modifier keys are pressed. The constants {@link #SHIFTMASK}, {@link #CTRLMASK}, {@link #ALTMASK}, {@link #METAMASK} and {@link #CAPSLOCK_MASK} define the bit positions of the corresponding keys.

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {Integer} A bit map with the pressed modifier keys.
@return.description: A bit map with the pressed modifier keys.

raw: * Return in a bit map, which lock keys are pressed. The constants
* {@link #CAPSLOCK_MASK}, {@link #NUMLOCK_MASK}, and {@link #SCROLLLOCK_MASK}
* define the bit positions of the corresponding keys.
* @return {Integer} A bit map with the locked keys.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Return in a bit map, which lock keys are pressed. The constants {@link #CAPSLOCKMASK}, {@link #NUMLOCKMASK}, and {@link #SCROLLLOCK_MASK} define the bit positions of the corresponding keys.

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {Integer} A bit map with the locked keys.
@return.description: A bit map with the locked keys.

raw: * Returns whether the ctrl key is pressed.
* @return {Boolean} whether the ctrl key is pressed.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Returns whether the ctrl key is pressed.

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {Boolean} whether the ctrl key is pressed.
@return.description: whether the ctrl key is pressed.

raw: * Returns whether the ctrl key or (on the Mac) the command key is pressed.
* @return {Boolean} true if the command key is pressed on the Mac
*           or the ctrl key is pressed on another system.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Returns whether the ctrl key or (on the Mac) the command key is pressed.

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {Boolean} true if the command key is pressed on the Mac or the ctrl key is pressed on another system.
@return.description: true if the command key is pressed on the Mac or the ctrl key is pressed on another system.
